itunes_info:
Payment will be charged from your iTunes account after confirmation.

Subscription will be automatically renewed if you do not turn it off 24 hours before the expiry.

Payment for subscription renewal will be charged from your iTunes account 24 hours before the end of the current period at the same price.

You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in your iTunes account settings.
